name: Bowels of the Ocean
description:
It calls to you in the night, in your dreams... You must feed it.

Descend into the depths of the ocean with your speargun to hunt fish and other aquatic life to feed an ancient, eldritch horror.

Bowels of the Ocean is a horror-themed underwater hunting game made for the Haunted PS1 Summer Of Shivers. 

Inspired by Squirrel Stapler, Feed Me Billy and 90's hunting sims.

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/blakemprods
